name: Lucky Drop
description:
Do you want to play a game of Lucky Drop?

The rules are simple. Place a bet, take the ball, and drop it in the board. If the ball lands on an O, you double your money! But if it lands on an X, you lose what you bet.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrow Keys - move the ball left and right
  • Space - drop the ball

Credits:

  • svntax - Programming, Art
  • Dante - Music, Sound
  • PVNDY - Sound

Resources:

  • m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen
